remarks: Cancellation law for group subtraction.  ( ~ nnncan2 analog.) (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Dec-2014.)
statement:
grpnnncan2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpnnncan2.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
grpnnncan2 $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X .- Z ) .- ( Y .- Z ) ) = ( X .- Y ) ) $.
